ops.description: Bank[6][8] = getLastFieldMapId(); // wm does not count

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // {Cloud}
“By the way,
what did you want to say a minute ago?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:32}); // {Aeris}
“We don't have time for this!
We've got to go after {Cait Sith}.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // {Aeris}
“I had fun tonight.
Let's do it again.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:9}); // {Aeris}
“Oh, don't tease me like that!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:10}); // {Aeris}
“I'm glad.”{PAUSE}“Next time we come,
let's take our time
and go on more rides.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // {Aeris}
“Oh, look at the time.
We'd better get going.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:29}); // {Barret}
“Hey! You gotta be kiddin'!
Just us two?
…ok, that's cool, I guess…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:35}); // {Barret}
“The hell you doin'!?
We gotta go after {Cait Sith}!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:12}); // {Barret}
“Oh man
I'm beat.
Let's head back.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:33}); // {Tifa}
“There's no time for this.
Let's hurry after {Cait Sith}!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:1}); // {Tifa}
“{Cloud}
I really had fun tonight.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // {Tifa}
“Oh, look at the time.
We should be getting back.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:34}); // {Yuffie}
“Should we be doing this?
I thought we were after {Cait Sith}?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:13}); // {Yuffie}
“I should sleep
really well tonight.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:14}); // {Yuffie}
“Thanks…
for coming with me.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:0}); // “Sorry it's out of order.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:31}); // “Here you are, two tickets.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:24}); // “Enjoy the sights
of Gold Saucer.”
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:4, type:2, adjust:0});

dialogStrings:
{Cloud}
“By the way,
what did you want to say a minute ago?”

{Tifa}
“Oh, look at the time.
We should be getting back.”

{Aeris}
“I had fun tonight.
Let's do it again.”

{Aeris}
“Don't you like being with me?”
{CHOICE}No, I don't
{CHOICE}That's not it

{Aeris}
“I'm glad.”{PAUSE}“Next time we come,
let's take our time
and go on more rides.”

{Aeris}
“Oh, look at the time.
We'd better get going.”

{Barret}
“Oh man
I'm beat.
Let's head back.”

“Welcome.
This attraction is 3 GP.{PAUSE}“Shall you be riding this evening?”
{CHOICE}Yes, I shall
{CHOICE}No, I shan't

“Um, I'm very sorry, but
you do not have enough GP.”

“Would this be your
first time riding with us?”
{CHOICE}Yes, it would
{CHOICE}No, it would not

“You will be able to see
all of Gold Saucer
park on this ride.{PAUSE}So please just sit back and
enjoy a lovely view you
won't see anywhere else.”

“This attraction can only
accommodate 2 passengers, so one
of you please wait over there.”

{Barret}
“Hey! You gotta be kiddin'!
Just us two?
…ok, that's cool, I guess…”

{Aeris}
“We don't have time for this!
We've got to go after {Cait Sith}.”

{Tifa}
“There's no time for this.
Let's hurry after {Cait Sith}!”

{Yuffie}
“Should we be doing this?
I thought we were after {Cait Sith}?”

{Barret}
“The hell you doin'!?
We gotta go after {Cait Sith}!”
